title: Is We Dumb? | Trespassing. Quack. Thumb. Satanic Catholic Baby.
description:
Did you know it's NOT okay to have your wedding at a stranger's mansion who had no idea you were planning on having a wedding on his property in the first place?! I would hope so. Let's talk about that, how much a baby moose weighs, 300 bikers escorting a young lady to her prom, swearing at toddlers, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/NVWel_y2gAw
